name: Twisted (itch) (KRIstudios)
description:
Embark on a great journey with the the odd couple of Ollson and Flo!

After a mysterious explosion Ollson finds a mysterious little being called Flo in the rubble of master sage Jhin's house. Together they set out to find out what has caused the world to be covered in a weird purple goop and why the grand master sage suddenly has disappeared. Facing interesting characters and travelling the world they bond together on a journey to find the truth of Ghoxies.

Game creators:

Artists:

  • Kristofer Söderström
  • Georg Granö

Coders:

  • Niklas Krogerus
  • Simon Bagge

Twisted is an "Arcada University of Applied Sciences - Games theory and design" course project and is a prototype of a larger game concept. The current version consists of chapter 1 of the story.

Created with Gamemaker Studio 2 and is currently only tested on PC.
